page.title: 12 K.I.C.A.
page.content:
{K.I.C.A.}stands for {Kirk Ireton {Community Association.}There is a committee which organises the{Wakes {Week}celebration every year. The money that is made during Wakes week is used to help the village.
A{village news sheet}is distributed every month with news of events that have taken place, and advertising others that are yet to happen. Anything that is of interest to the village may be included. { Kirk Ireton is also included in the area covered by the{Wirksworth and {District Community Education Council.} It also publishes a newspaper every month and organises events for everybody in the district.
